nodes.text: The Oblee is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on January 13, 2005 and took the form of an interview between Yara Grugara and the crimelord Nirama regarding the return of his people, the Oblee to the Cularin system. This was followed by roleplaying statistics for the Oblee.
